subject: Re: [junit] Re: Junit4.9b1 not work
msgSnippet: Emanuela, You re likely to get more answers if you keep CC ing the mailing list by using Reply to All . Can you try using the -cp flag to the java command to
messageBody:
Emanuela,

You're likely to get more answers if you keep CC'ing the mailing list by
using "Reply to All".

Can you try using the -cp flag to the java command to override the
environment variable? Thanks,

David Saff

> >> > Hi,
> >> >
> >> > Problem fixed.
> >> > I did not completely convert over from junit3 to junit4.
> >> > I had the testclass still inheriting from junit3 TestCase.
> >> > It all works now.
> >> >
> >> > Thanks for your help,
> >> > Patrick
